definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

sentences.english: Above prices are in MOP and are subject to 10% service charge.
sentences.chinese: 以上價目以澳門幣結算，需附加10%的服務費。

sentences.english: RMB1280 for two person, Get one bottle of Australia Allson Parsons, Whithout 15% surcharge.
sentences.chinese: 兩份1280元，送澳洲富獅紅酒一瓶，免服務費。

sentences.english: It's about $ 55 dollars a day including heat , but excluding the service charge.
sentences.chinese: 包括取暖費在內每日55美元，但不包括服務費。

sentences.english: All prices are subject to a 10% service charge.
sentences.chinese: 以上價目另收加一服務費。

sentences.english: All cocktails are individual priced and subject to 15% service charge.
sentences.chinese: 詳細價格請參照酒水牌，另需加15%服務費。

sentences.english: I'm afraid there is a 10 percent tax and service charge.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕還有10%的稅收和服務費您未算進去。

sentences.english: Tax and service are both included.
sentences.chinese: 房價中已包含稅和服務費。

sentences.english: Party A should pay Part C 3 months' service fee in advance.
sentences.chinese: 甲方一次向丙方支付三個月的服務費。

sentences.english: There is a two-dollar charge for that.
sentences.chinese: 這要收取兩美元的服務費。

sentences.english: The lawsuit also alleges that AT&T overcharged for services in other areas.
sentences.chinese: 該訴訟還指控AT&T在其他地區收取過高的服務費。

sentences.english: All the above rates are inclusive of 15% surcharge and one free daily buffet breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 以上房價已包括15%服務費及一份西式早餐。

sentences.english: Pre-pay one year fee, one-time payment enjoy 12 months services.
sentences.chinese: 一次性預繳一年服務費，已可享用12個月的服務。

sentences.english: The room rate is 140 dollars a night, plus service charge.
sentences.chinese: 房價是每天140美元，服務費另加。

sentences.english: All prices are in RMB and subject to 15% service charge.
sentences.chinese: 以上價格爲人民幣，需要另付15%服務費。

sentences.english: Siauliai CCIC is financed by voluntary membership and services fees.
sentences.chinese: 立陶宛希奧利艾商會，是由自願加入和服務費。

sentences.english: All prices are subject to a 15% service charge. ;
sentences.chinese: 所有定價須另加15%的服務費。

definition: to pay/to hand over (tax payment etc)
to return (sth borrowed etc)/to send back/to refund/to rebate
